summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, between FBI personnel discussing a request from the Deputy Director (DD) for a summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend. The emails coordinate providing background information and scheduling an interview with her.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased financier whose girlfriend is the subject of the FBI's inquiry.

events.title: FBI email coordination on Epstein's girlfriend
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to address a Deputy Director's request for information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend, including her background and a planned interview.

keyFacts: The FBI's Deputy Director requested a short summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend in August 2019, shortly after Epstein's death.
The FBI was seeking information on the girlfriend's background, origin, and a timeline for a future interview.
An interview with the girlfriend was tentatively scheduled for that Friday (August 16, 2019).
The document indicates the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force and New York Field Office were involved in this line of inquiry.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination following Epstein's death to gather information on his close associates.
